articles.description: One of the confusion most diabetic patients have is the type of fruit they should include in their diet.
articles.content: For any diabetes patient, the greatest challenge is to manage their blood sugar level. Once diagnosed with the condition, their diet becomes a little restrictive, and any food items (particularly sug… [+560 chars]
